plugin.name: ðŸ“ Forms
plugin.description: Dynamic Forms for NotePlan using Templating -- fill out a form and have the data sent to a template for processing
plugin.author: dwertheimer

plugin.commands.name: Open Template Form
plugin.commands.description: Open form for template data entry which will be sent to a template for processing. Generally invoked from an xcallback

plugin.commands.name: Form Builder
plugin.commands.description: Visual form builder to create and edit form field definitions without writing JSON manually

plugin.commands.name: Create Processing Template
plugin.commands.description: Create a form processing template separately (for use with existing form templates)

plugin.commands.name: onFormSubmitFromHTMLView
plugin.commands.description: React Form Calling back to plugin

plugin.commands.name: onFormBuilderAction
plugin.commands.description: React FormBuilder Calling back to plugin

plugin.commands.name: onMessageFromHTMLView
plugin.commands.description: dwertheimer.Forms: Callback function to receive messages from HTML view

plugin.settings.COMMENT: This is for use by the editSettings helper function. PluginID must match the plugin.id in the top of this file

plugin.settings.NOTE: DO NOT CHANGE THE FOLLOWING SETTINGS; ADD YOUR SETTINGS ABOVE ^^^

plugin.settings.title: Log Level
plugin.settings.description:
Set how much logging output will be displayed when executing Forms commands in NotePlan Plugin Console Logs (NotePlan -> Help -> Plugin Console)

 - DEBUG: Show All Logs
 - INFO: Only Show Info, Warnings, and Errors
 - WARN: Only Show Errors or Warnings
 - ERROR: Only Show Errors
 - none: Don't show any logs
